Package com.milav.jaguar.account

Class AccountController

java.lang.Object
com.milav.jaguar.account.AccountController
@Controller public class AccountController extends Object
The class deals with methods that have to do with user's accounts.
Author:
Milav Shah, Jigar Shah

  • Method Details

    • saveChanges

      @GetMapping("/savechanges") public String saveChanges(@RequestParam("firstname") String firstname, @RequestParam("lastname") String lastname, @RequestParam("currentPassword") String currentPassword, @RequestParam("email") String newEmail, @RequestParam("newPassword") String newPassword, org.springframework.ui.Model model, @NotNull @NotNull javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session) throws DBException
      Saves the changes the user made to their profile.

      Pretty much the most complicated method. The method checks the user's password; and if it matches with the one in the database, we accept any incoming account information changes.

      Parameters:
      firstname - the new firstname
      lastname - the new lastname
      currentPassword - the current password
      newEmail - the new email
      newPassword - the new password
      model - model
      session - HttpSession
      Returns:
      String
      Throws:
      DBException - since we are connecting to the database

    • deleteAccount

      @GetMapping("/removeaccount") public String deleteAccount(@RequestParam("password") String password, org.springframework.ui.Model model, @NotNull @NotNull javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session) throws DBException
      Deletes the users account.
      Parameters:
      password - the user's password confirmation.
      model - model
      session - the session in which the user's information is stored.
      Returns:
      String
      Throws:
      DBException - we are connecting to the database to delete the account.

    • goToDeleteAccount

      @GetMapping("/deleteaccount") public String goToDeleteAccount()
      As expected, the method takes the user to the deleteaccount page.
      Returns:
      String
